name: Verify and validate the Flow Gadget using Workflow functionality in Studio.
objective: To verify that the Flow Gadget works as expected with Workflow functionality in Studio, ensuring correct execution, navigation, and data processing without errors. Using Start node, Multimodal, If-Else and End nodes.
precondition:
1. User has valid Super Admin credentials.

  2. At least one organization is already created.

  3. The organization has the Beta toggle enabled (Studio feature currently active).

inline.description: Enter a valid workflow name and click on the Save button.
inline.expectedResult: The workflow should be saved successfully, and a confirmation message should be displayed. The newly created workflow should also appear in the workflow list and also display the all available nodes.
